CustomField.formula: IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_3_rating__c)) > 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxYZ", "£", 16, 16),"") + IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_3_rating__c)) > 1, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxYY", "€", 16, 16),"") + IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_3_rating__c)) > 2, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxYX", "$", 16, 16),"")
CustomField.label: Out of 3 Currency
